HollowMod:Zote.NAME: Zote the Mighty
DIALOG: I am Zote the Mighty, a knight of great renown. NL My weapon, 'Life Ender' has struck down hundreds of foes. NL Begone, or you'll be next!
Know this, cur. I am Zote the Mighty
Hoy! What are you doing, you clumsy little oaf?
Go on, cur! Scurry away! Lest I humiliate you further!
Begone! Lest I draw my nail..
I'm not interested in your childish games. I need my rest.
Venim is Trying to fix this NL but if you hit escape twice it will bring up the map.
